extendedInfo.description: BrisDroid is designed to help you get where you need to go using public transport in Brisbane, Australia. Using Google Maps and GPS assistance, it's easier than ever before to know exactly where your stop is and how long you have until you get there. BrisDroid works with all bus, train and ferry routes in Brisbane and surrounding areas. It's a journey planning app with all the public transport routes, in your pocket.Things you can do with BrisDroid:* See exactly where every stop is using Google Maps* Receive a notification when your stop is approaching* Use the same journey planner you're already familiar with* Use your current location to find the closest stop near you* Use addresses taken straight from your contacts* Save and load your favourite locations with ease* Get direct links to useful pages on the TransLink website* Works similar to Google Transit, but for public transport in Brisbane!We're constantly striving to make BrisDroid bigger, better and easier to use: if you have any feedback what-so-ever, including bug reports or feature requests, feel free to email us at info@brisdroid.com.BrisDroid uses a number of a different sources for stop location information, including the following:* Bus stops: http://data.brisbane.qld.gov.au/index.php/dataset/bus-stops/* Ferry terminals: http://data.brisbane.qld.gov.au/index.php/dataset/ferry-terminals/Our data is not always 100% accurate: if you come across a stop that's in the wrong location or missing entirely, feel free to let us know by either reporting it in-app or sending us an email.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Edit: The \'incorrect data\' bug has been fixed! Once again one of my top \"must have\" apps! Well done guys, keep up the great work.   Excellent app, continuous updates, couldn\'t ask for anything more for an app like this.  Edit 2: Just discovered what the share function does. Best public transport app ever, hands down.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best transport app around...
reviews.comment: Thanks for such an intuitive app. Accurate and very easy to use. A+
reviews.author: Craig Rubb

reviews.title: Very useful but..
reviews.comment: Fix with new translink update, it\'s actually no more usable for many travels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Map is a bit laggy, but everything else is great!
reviews.author: Reynardt Jooste

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I tried this out today. I was interested on the bus stop maps as I am always a bit nervous going somewhere new on a bus. Seeing the stops as we went along worked flawlessly. Very impressed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app, best money I have ever spent
reviews.comment: Amazingly useful app, makes Brisbane transport easy. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good :-)
reviews.comment: really awesome of your nervous about going somewhere you havent been before on public transport.. you don\'t usually know your stop so it\'s good to be aware if it\'s coming up soon :-) j just be careful cause if your WiFi isn\'t turned on its not very fast!
reviews.author: Marissa Gillham

reviews.title: Extremely poor design.
reviews.comment: Not really developed and tested in a variety of settings. Slow. Freezes on a powerful phone. Guys check what apps they have in Sydney or Melbourne. (I guess this app mirrors the general intellectual inferiority of Brissie\'s transit system compared to Sys and Melb. We are being ripped off here!).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The dev is pushing out regular updates to deal with translink changing their systems. Must have for those unfortunate enough to live in Brisbane and have to deal with translink.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer working
reviews.comment: \"Server was contactable but returned incorrect data\" error message received whenever I try to use it. Used to be good however even uninstalling/reinstalling didn\'t fix it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: bishoy
reviews.comment: i would suggest adding an auto tracking to the live map, but the app  is perfect.  thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Better than that free app, works with ICS, has that new car smell...

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.title: Great

reviews.title: Great app.

reviews.comment: Great app!
